name: Agnes III
flavor: Old Agnes says that this is no world for half measures.

name: Antimuon ESc
flavor: Can not the smallest particle menace the greatest warrior?

name: Arcana ESc
flavor: Could anyone even claim to know the questions…or all the answers?

name: Baryonic ESm
flavor: What mysteries lie in the smallest shards of reality?

name: Binary Dawn
flavor: "One day you will see them both." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Black Chasma ESc
flavor: A lightweight and snappy Nadir shotgun, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Bronzed Chasma ESc
flavor: A brute force Nadir firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Burden of Proof XI
flavor: Executor-issued shotgun for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Cepheid ESm
flavor: What strange discoveries lie beyond our orbit?

name: Chasma Esc
flavor: The ESc's blunt exterior conceals a superb multirole shotgun with multiple systems bays.

name: Conspiracy Theory-D
flavor: You're not paranoid if there really is a monolithic embodiment of pure evil out to get you.

name: Copperhead Mk. 32
flavor: The heavy-load Mk. 32 provides the punctuation mark at the end of a lot of lives.

name: Crash Casket 81
flavor: Press here to fill shallow graves.

name: Cúchulainn-D
flavor: You may die, but you will die on your feet, facing your enemies.

name: Deadlander Mk. 24
flavor: The perfect close-quarters tool. The Deadlander pays its way in hurt - overpacked shells deal excellent damage.

name: Ded Alia III
flavor: Challenge every reality. There is always another way.

name: Ded Hexia IV
flavor: A pox upon your enemies.

name: Ded Laurea IV
flavor: An instrument for turning thoughts and wills into realities.

name: Ded Regnum III
flavor: Your own mind must be your first conquest. Do not let it be your last.

name: Ded Venefici I
flavor: In Dark hearts, your Light is a righteous poison.

name: Deidris's Retort
flavor: A brute-force weapon, forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Dido-A
flavor: Wanderer, your journey will end with victory.

name: Double Nickel
flavor: A blunt reminder that this particular room belongs to you.

name: Dry Rot 32
flavor: Custom-rigged hole puncher.

name: Felwinter's Lie
flavor: close quarters weapon forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Found Verdict
flavor: Witness.

name: Graviton ESe
flavor: The perfect close-quarters tool. A cut-down holdout weapon, the Graviton is easy to ready and aim.

name: Graviton ESm
flavor: A novice Guardian fought off a horde of Dreg with wit, reflexes, and this lightweight shotgun.

name: Häkke Test-A
flavor: Häkke prototype. Use against Hive targets to gather data for Häkke's armament scientists.

name: Hard Luck Charm
flavor: Luck is a four-letter word.

name: Harrowed Silence of A'arn
flavor: "Without victory, we cannot go home!" —Primus A'arn

name: Her Champion
flavor: Raise a hand against her, and we will raise ours in return.

name: Her Courtesy
flavor: Etiquette is a powerful weapon.

name: Her Eyes
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Her Unspoken Will
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Hide and Seek-42
flavor: A close-quarters modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: I PROTEST
flavor: It's DISGRACEFUL!

name: Immobius
flavor: As long as you can't move me, I can't be moved.

name: Impulse Esc
flavor: Rumor says the Fallen call it the Ambition Maul, for all the proud Captains it has humbled.

name: In Times of Need
flavor: In case of emergency, point at enemies and pull trigger. Repeat as necessary.

name: Invective
flavor: "I tried to talk them down. They made a grab for my Ghost. After that it was a short conversation." - Ikora Rey

name: Invisible Hand M7
flavor: Built so light, it sometimes feels like it's not even there.

name: Jingukogo-D
flavor: The Häkke Jingukogo-D is a balanced weapon, built for conquest.

name: Judgment VI
flavor: Executor-issued close quarters weapon for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: LOCKJAW
flavor: Leave them speechless.

name: Lord of Wolves
flavor: "By this right alone do I rule."

name: Matador 64
flavor: Be the bull.

name: Outlander Mk. 26
flavor: The perfect close-quarters tool. The Outlander's ominous maw speaks truth - it deals exemplary damage for its class.

name: Outlander Mk. 38
flavor: A mad spitter, tuned for nothing but suffering.

name: Party Crasher +1
flavor: I said INVITE ONLY!

name: Patch-A
flavor: A shotgun, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: Preacher Mk. 11
flavor: The perfect close-quarters tool. The Preacher only knows one sermon. It's pretty good, though.

name: Preacher Mk. 20
flavor: The perfect close-quarters tool. The Preacher sets a mind at peace.

name: Preacher Mk. 22
flavor: The perfect close-quarters tool. The Preacher's always there when you need her.

name: Rude Awakening DOA
flavor: High-impact firepower modified to fit the exacting specifications of Dead Orbit's expanding arsenal.

name: Sagitta
flavor: A Guardian relic named for the arrow of the night sky.

name: Secret Handshake
flavor: Redacted.

name: SG-Scattercast
flavor: A Vanguard-issue shotgun, thoroughly tested and completely reliable.

name: Sidewinder Mk.53
flavor: Nimble and aggressive, the Mk.53 has a vicious bite.

name: Silence of A'arn
flavor: "Without victory, we cannot go home!" —Primus A'arn

name: Stolen Will
flavor: "Our enemies have taken much from us. We will steal everything from them." —Petra Venj

name: Strongbow-D
flavor: The bloodthirsty Häkke Strongbow-D is a weapon fit for a conqueror.

name: SUROS MKB-21
flavor: The perfect close-quarters tool. The MKB-21 is a flexible tactical shotgun commonly used by the City's internal patrols.

name: SUROS MKB-33
flavor: A tactical upgrade to the MKB multirole shotgun line. Handy for close encounters.

name: SUROS MKB-51
flavor: Built for support, the multirole MKB-51 cuts through tough situations.

name: Swordbreaker
flavor: If you're going to face down a Knight with an ascendant blade, bring an ascendant gun.

name: The 4th Horseman
flavor: It's not a holdout weapon, it's a pathfinder.

name: The Chaperone
flavor: "My mother had a shotgun we called the Chaperone. Kept us alive out there, before we got to the City." —Amanda Holliday

name: The Comedian
flavor: A. A ha. A ha ha ha. A ha ha ha ha ha ha ha

name: The Crash
flavor: A close quarters weapon named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: The Next Big Thing
flavor: Actually, I'm already pretty famous on Mars, so...."

name: Two for the Road
flavor: The rail-assisted firing mechanism provides ferocious punch. External cables armored for durability.

name: Two To The Morgue
flavor: You know the old saying…

name: Universal Remote
flavor: To the untrained eye this beast is a junker. To the trained eye, however, this junker…is a beast.

name: Vector Esc
flavor: This weapon revels in savage close-quarters combat.

name: Wolfborne Oath
flavor: "In the pack leader we trust."

name: Matador 64
flavor: Be the bull.

name: QUANTIPLASM~
flavor: Dido-A: Wanderer, your journey will end with ~SIVA

name: The Proud Spire
flavor: Forged in honor of Silimar, he who let his mighty deeds speak for themselves.

name: Unraveling Thread
flavor: "You have woven yourself a funeral shroud!" —Fractal Scrolls

name: 44 Curtain Call
flavor: This high-impact weapon was designed to be a literal showstopper.

name: Bad Counsel IV
flavor: Executor-issued shotgun for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Last-Ditch 001
flavor: A shotgun, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: Occam's Razor
flavor: Sometimes the simplest ways are best.
